org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin

Interface LongTaskRunner<T extends AbstractLongTask<L,I>,R extends LongTaskRepository<T,L,I>,L extends org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<I>,I extends java.io.Serializable,A extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<L,I>>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - Associated type of locked entity.
    I - Associated type of locked entity's identifier.
    A - Repository managing the locked entity.
    R - Repository managing the task entity.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LongTaskRunnerNode<T,R>, LongTaskRunnerSubscription<T,R>

    public interface LongTaskRunner<T extends AbstractLongTask<L,I>,R extends LongTaskRepository<T,L,I>,L extends org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<I>,I extends java.io.Serializable,A extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<L,I>>
    A resource running some long task. Implementing this interface causes the subscription management checks there is no running task when a deletion is requested. The contract :
    • At most one task can run per node
    • A subscription cannot be deleted while there is a running attached task
    • A running task is task without "end" date.
    • When a task is started, is will always ends.
    • When a task ends, the status (boolean) is always updated.

      • getTaskRepository

        R getTaskRepository()
        Return the task repository.
        Returns:
        The task repository used to fetch and update the task from inner transaction.

        Return the SubscriptionRepository.
        Returns:

        Supplier, on demand new task entity creation. Only bean constructor, no involved persistence operation.
        Returns:

      • endTask

        default T endTask(I lockedId,
                  boolean failed)
        Release the lock on the locked entity by its identifier. The task is considered as finished.
        Parameters:
        lockedId - The locked entity's identifier.
        failed - The task status as resolution of this task.
        Returns:
        The ended task if present.

      • endTask

        default T endTask(I lockedId,
                  boolean failed,
                  java.util.function.Consumer<T> finalizer)
        Release the lock on the locked entity by its identifier. The task is considered as finished.
        Parameters:
        lockedId - The locked entity's identifier.
        failed - The task status as resolution of this task.
        finalizer - The function to call while finalizing the task.
        Returns:
        The ended task if present.

                  I lockedId)
        Return status of import.
        Parameters:
        lockedId - The locked entity's identifier.
        Returns:
        status of import. May null when there is no previous task.

      • startTask

        default T startTask(I lockedId,
                    java.util.function.Consumer<T> initializer)
        Check there no running task within the same scope of the locked's identifier and starts a new task.
        Parameters:
        lockedId - The locked entity's identifier.
        initializer - The function to call while initializing the task.
        Returns:
        the locked task with status.

      • createAsNeeded

        default T createAsNeeded(I lockedId)

        Returns:
